form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FORM FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 PLACE DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA Guadalajara, Mexico DATE OF EXAMINATION MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS December 24 1975 At the request of the American Consul at CITY COUNTRY Guadalajara, Mexico I certify that on the above date I examined NAME AGE SEX Ma Rosario Valadez de Ibarra 60. F, WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Insanity Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): CLASS B. Obesityo Normal. Chest X-ray report Efrain Orozco de la T. from Dr. Negative Angel Morales Castroo Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL FORM Method TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT T M.D. FS-398 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. 10-74
